attributes.action: Extend those who have passed theory for at least 9 months
attributes.additional_details: Extend the due date for theories for all candidates that have passed
attributes.background: Due to lockdown and pauses in people’s learning due to COVID they should have the theory added to by 9 months as it’s UNFAIR especially if they have Mental Health battles

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Extend driving theory test certificates expiring in 2020/21 by 12 months
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558160
